manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.unity3d.player.UnityPlayerActivity) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

manifest_analysis.title:
Activity (com.unity.purchasing.googleplay.VRPurchaseActivity) is not Protected.
An intent-filter exists.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Activity is explicitly exported.
manifest_analysis.name: is not Protected.An intent-filter exists.

file_analysis.finding: Certificate/Key files hardcoded inside the app.

playstore_details.title: Miga Town: My Apartment
playstore_details.description:
In this new community, you are able to visit each and every one of your neighbors and friends.

 It's an intriguing place where you can decorate your new house at any time, and choose household supplies of the most suitable styles and sizes in the household stores downstairs. The Activity Center downstairs will organize fascinating events every day, turning the neighborhood into a huge party house.

More enjoyable scenes and customized gameplay for you to create a better story!

About MIGA KIDS

MIGA KIDS provides child games featuring digital dollhouses for children all over the world. We insist on the idea of expressing ourselves and holding on to our original aspiration, and endeavor to produce exhilarating games during the learning of game design. Moreover, we seek to produce value beyond games in the future by virtues of more experience. 

We have created toys that could not possibly exist in our childhood. 

Please visit www.miga-kids.com  to learn more information about us. 

We will be more than happy to receive your opinion and advice, please mail to
support@xihegame.com
playstore_details.summary: Welcome to the new community! Customized gameplay for you to create new story!
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Welcome to the new community! Customized gameplay for you to create new story!
playstore_details.developerAddress: Middle Of Huangpu Road, No. 149, The Second Floor Of The 64 Tian
